properties.entry: INSERT INTO SUPPORT(SUPPORT_NO, SHELTER_NO, MEMBER_NO, MERCHANT_UID, AMOUNT, STATUS, DP_WD, WD_STATUS) VALUES(SQ_SUPPORT_PK.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'PENDING', 'DP', 'N')
UPDATE SUPPORT SET STATUS = ? WHERE MERCHANT_UID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROWNUM) ROW_NUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT SU.SUPPORT_NO, SH.SHELTER_NAME, SU.AMOUNT, SU.PAY_TIME FROM SUPPORT SU INNER JOIN SHELTER SH on SH.SHELTER_NO = SU.SHELTER_NO WHERE STATUS = 'DONE' AND SU.MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY PAY_TIME DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
) WHERE ROW_NUM >= ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROWNUM) ROW_NUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT SU.SUPPORT_NO, SH.SHELTER_NAME, SU.AMOUNT, SU.PAY_TIME FROM SUPPORT SU INNER JOIN SHELTER SH on SH.SHELTER_NO = SU.SHELTER_NO WHERE STATUS = 'DONE' AND SU.MEMBER_NO = ? AND SU.PAY_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY PAY_TIME DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= ? ) WHERE ROW_NUM >= ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUPPORT SU INNER JOIN SHELTER SH on SH.SHELTER_NO = SU.SHELTER_NO WHERE STATUS = 'DONE' AND SU.MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY PAY_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUPPORT SU INNER JOIN SHELTER SH on SH.SHELTER_NO = SU.SHELTER_NO WHERE STATUS = 'DONE' AND SU.MEMBER_NO = ? AND SU.PAY_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY PAY_TIME DESC
